dark_beings.name: Sauron

features.name: Great Power
features.description: Sauron possesses immense magical and physical power, commanding vast armies and manipulating others.

features.name: The One Ring
features.description: Sauron's primary tool for control and corruption, central to his power and influence.

dark_beings.background_story: Sauron, originally a Maia spirit, became the Dark Lord of Mordor. His ambition to dominate Middle-earth led him to forge the One Ring, which he used to corrupt and control others.

appearance.description: Sauron often appears as a great, fiery eye atop his dark tower, Barad-dûr. In his true form, he is a formidable being of shadow and flame.

tools.name: The One Ring
tools.description: A powerful artifact forged by Sauron to control all other rings of power and dominate Middle-earth.

tools.name: The Eye of Sauron
tools.description: A manifestation of Sauron's will, used to observe and control from a distance.

quotes: One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them, One Ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them.
I see you. I see your will is breaking. I see it all.

dark_beings.name: Nazgûl

features.name: Ring Wraiths
features.description: Nazgûl are bound to Sauron through their rings, having become wraith-like beings of immense fear and strength.

features.name: Enhanced Senses
features.description: Nazgûl have heightened senses, enabling them to track the One Ring and its bearers.

dark_beings.background_story: The Nazgûl, also known as Ringwraiths, were once powerful kings who were corrupted by the Nine Rings given to them by Sauron. They are now enslaved to his will, existing as spectral servants.

appearance.description: Nazgûl are cloaked in dark, tattered robes and are often described as shadowy figures with no visible faces.

tools.name: Rings of Power
tools.description: Given to them by Sauron, these rings enslaved them to his will and turned them into wraiths.

tools.name: Dark Swords
tools.description: Weapons wielded by the Nazgûl, feared for their deadly strikes and dark enchantments.

quotes: We will not let them pass.

dark_beings.name: Balrog

features.name: Fire and Shadow
features.description: Balrogs are enveloped in flames and shadows, possessing great destructive power.

features.name: Physical Might
features.description: They have immense physical strength and are capable of causing great damage in battle.

dark_beings.background_story: Balrogs are ancient demons that served Morgoth, the first Dark Lord. They were cast into the deep places of the world after Morgoth's defeat, and one remained in Moria until it was awakened by the dwarves.

appearance.description: Balrogs are massive, fiery entities with a dark, shadowy form. They wield whips of fire and are surrounded by an aura of flame.

tools.name: Whip of Flame
tools.description: A burning whip used by the Balrog in combat, capable of causing immense pain and destruction.

tools.name: Shadowy Aura
tools.description: A dark presence that surrounds the Balrog, instilling fear in those who face it.

quotes: You cannot pass! I am a servant of the Secret Fire, wielder of the flame of Anor. The dark fire will not avail you, flame of Udûn! Go back to the shadow. You shall not pass!
The darkness will not avail you!

dark_beings.name: Gollum

features.name: Corruption by the Ring
features.description: Smeagol was transformed into Gollum by the influence of the One Ring, becoming a twisted, obsessed creature.

features.name: Gollum's Knowledge
features.description: Gollum has extensive knowledge about the One Ring and its history, due to his long possession of it.

dark_beings.background_story: Gollum was a Hobbit-like creature who found the One Ring and was corrupted by its power, becoming Gollum. He lived in isolation in the depths of the Misty Mountains before being encountered by Frodo and Sam.

appearance.description: Gollum is a small, emaciated creature with large, bulging eyes and a hunched posture. His appearance is marked by his long fingers and sharp teeth.

tools.name: The One Ring
tools.description: The object of Gollum's obsession, granting him longevity but also corrupting his mind.

tools.name: Gollum's Sting
tools.description: A sharp weapon used by Gollum to defend himself or attack others.

quotes: Stupid, fat hobbit! He ruins it!
We wants it, we needs it. Must have the precious. They stole it from us.
We are alone, we want to be alone, we need to be alone.
Ooh, we knows, we knowss. SHUT UP!!
We likes goblinses, batses and fishes. But we hasn't tried hobbitses before. Is it soft, is it juicy?

dark_beings.name: Shelob

features.name: Venomous
features.description: Shelob is highly venomous, capable of killing or incapacitating her prey with her poison.

features.name: Great Size and Strength
features.description: Shelob is a massive and powerful spider, feared for her strength and ferocity.

dark_beings.background_story: Shelob is an ancient and malevolent giant spider who dwells in the pass of Cirith Ungol. She is a descendant of the great spider Ungoliant and has long terrorized the lands of Mordor.

appearance.description: Shelob is a colossal spider with a dark, hairy body and glowing eyes. Her presence is terrifying, and she exudes an aura of malevolence.

tools.name: Webs of Entrapment
tools.description: Shelob uses her webs to ensnare and trap her victims, making escape nearly impossible.

tools.name: Poison Fangs
tools.description: Shelob's fangs deliver a potent venom that can paralyze or kill her prey.

quotes: I am Shelob. I am the last child of Ungoliant. I am your doom!
